comment: A double specialization using explicit substitution. This is Theorem PM*11.1 in [WhiteheadRussell] p. 159. See ~ stdpc4 for the analogous single specialization. See ~ 2sp for another double specialization. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 24-May-2011.) (Revised by BJ, 21-Oct-2018.)
